name: Cube Speed Run
description:
OrfeasWorldGames Studio Are Returning To Their Old Roots With The Brand New Cube Speed Run! The Game Has Official Been Dead For A Very Long Time, But Today We Decided To Make The Full Game Of It Which Is Not Finished Yet.

___ABOUT CUBE SPEED RUN___

Cube Speed Run OR CSR Is A Speed Run Game, What Is Speed Run You Say? Well It's Something Like A Speedy Racing Game But It's Not Actually This. It's Basically A True Speed Run Game. The Game Hasn't Got Any Story But We Can Tell You Something Like The Prequel Of It. The Red Cube (you) Is The Last Cube Ever On The World. The Obstacles (traps) Are Your Fears, They Are Not Actually Your Enemies But It's Your Own Mind, IT'S YOUR FEARS. You Have To Get Rid Of Your FEARS And Move On Your Cuby Life.

___WHY CUBE SPEED RUN IS DELAYED___

The Answer Is Simple, We Didn't Knew What Else To DO. But Today We Woke Up And Say, We Will Be Making The 3.0 Version Of The CSR AND WE MADE THE FULL VERSION! We Can Say That We Might Never Worked On The CSR Project And We Wouldn't Be Making This Version. But We Had Fun Making It :)

___CUBE SPEED RUN FEATURES___

With The Brand New Version Of CSR, You Can Now: Select Which Level You Want To Play!

ALSO BRAND NEW STUFF ADDED!:

-Main Menu

-Pause Menu

-Brand New Soundtracks

-More Options

___NEW MUSIC & SOUNDTRACKS!___

If You Played The Older Versions Of CSR, You Will Surely Know That The Theme Of CSR Is The Music 'THE SETUP' From Favored Nation So In The New Version Of CSR We REMIXED The Music To Look Something Like Nostalgia!

ALSO BILLY IDOL HAS ADDED TO THE GAME! Do Like The 'Dancing With Myself' Song From Billy Idol And CSR At The Same Time? WELL IT'S TIME TO SHOW YOUR MOVES!

RETRO MUSIC IN CSR!

We've Also Added A Retro Soundtrack For Real Beat!

___SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS___

________MINIMUM________

•OS: WINDOWS 7/8/10

•PROCESSOR : INTEL CORE i3 8100

•GRAPHICS CARD: GeForce GT710 2GB LP- Radeon RX 550 2GB

•RAM: 4GB RAM

•DirectX: VERSION 11

•STORAGE: LESS THAN 300 MB AVAILABLE SPACE

________RECOMMENDED________

•OS: WINDOWS 7/8/10

•PROCESSOR: INTEL CORE i3 8350k

•GRAPHICS CARD: GeForce GTX 750ti 2GB-R9 270X 2GB

•RAM: 4GB RAM 

 •DirectX: VERSION 11

_____SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS FOR MAC_____

•PROCCESOR: INTEL (64-bit)  CORE I5-6500 OR BETTER (it might run on intel core duo but with not a good experience)

•RAM: 2GB RAM OR MORE

•STORAGE: LESS THAN 300MB AVAILABLE SPACE

•DISPLAY: ANY

_____SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS FOR LINUX_____

  • 3 GHz Dual PROCESSOR 
  • 4 GB RAM
  • GTX 1050 2GB/ RADEON RX  550 2GB
  • 1090 x 1080 RESOLUTION (or any)
  • LESS THAN 300 MB STORAGE SPACE

The Developers Describe The Content Like This:

This Game contains content which is appropriate for all ages!

Rated 7+
